parameter.name: clientId
parameter.label: Spotify Application Client ID
parameter.description: This is the Client ID provided by Spotify when you add a new Application for OpenHAB/SmartHome to your Spotify Account. Go to https://developer.spotify.com/

parameter.name: clientSecret
parameter.label: Spotify Application Client Secret
parameter.description: This is the Client Secret provided by Spotify when you add a new Application for OpenHAB/SmartHome to your Spotify Account.

parameter.name: refreshPeriod
parameter.label: Spotify Connect refresh period (seconds)
parameter.description: This is the frequency of the polling requests to the Spotify Connect WebAPI. There are limits to the number of requests that can be sent to the WebAPI. The more often you poll, the better status updates - at the risk of running out of your request quota.

parameter.name: refreshToken
parameter.label: Spotify Client Authorization Refresh Token
parameter.description: This is the refresh token provided by Spotify when you authorize yourself with the Web API and grant the required scope access. After authorization this field will hold the refreshToken used to re-authorize with the Web API.

channel-type.label: Spotify Token Refresh Trigger
channel-type.description: Channel for Spotify to initiate refresh of access token. This channel will automatically trigger ON/OFF state while the token is being refreshed.
